import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API;// เปลี่ยนตาม URL backend ของคุณ
export const getUserProfile=token=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/profile"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const updateUserProfile=(data,token)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/profile"),data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const changePassword=(currentPassword,newPassword,token)=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/profile/change-password"),{currentPassword,newPassword},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});
